text: Jim Page (born May 29, 1941) is an American skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1964 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:American male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of the United States Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1964 Winter Olympics Category:People from Lake Placid, New York
title: Jim Page (skier)
